subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: On the road, the Nets are one of the league’s top teams with a 10-5 record, but at home, they are 5-12, better than only the Washington Wizards in the Eastern Conference.
snippet: On the road, the Nets are one of the league’s top teams with a 10-5 record, but at home, they are 5-12, better than only the Washington Wizards in the Eastern Conference.
